short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy way to manage and organize your bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a web app that will have users to easily save and organize their bookmark. User can save a bookmark along with tags and description so it will be easier for users to search when needed.

I find myself saving a lot of bookmarks and it is hard for me to organize them because it only allow me to save bookmark inside a folder or sub folders. This tool will help user so they save their bookmark with categories a name and description.

Currently this is still under development and plan to launch in August.
